law.catch_line: Per diem of members who are not state employees -- Reimbursement for costs incurred.

text.section: Selection committee members who are not state employees shall receive a salary of one hundred dollars ($100) per day for those days authorized by the selection committee for selection committee activities.

Selection committee members who are state employees shall not receive a salary for their time spent on selection committee activities, and the state government salaries of these committee members shall not be reduced due to time spent away from other state government activities.
All selection committee members shall be reimbursed for costs necessarily incurred in carrying out their duties. All reimbursements shall be authorized by the selection committee.
The Finance and Administration Cabinet shall pay all costs generated under this section by the selection committee.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992.
